Package watchlist

Class WatchlistModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • watchlist.WatchlistModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.table.TableModel, IWatchlistModel
    public class WatchlistModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
implements IWatchlistModel, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    An instance of this class functions as the watchlist's data model. It holds the stocks that are contained in the watchlist, specifies the column names and overrides AbstractTableModel methods to act as a model for the WatchlistFrame, which is the view for the data contained herein.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • updateStockPrice

        public void updateStockPrice​(java.lang.String stockSymbol,
                             double newPrice)
        Set a new price for the stock with the specified symbol. The stock will set its price change direction value according to the new price which also changes price cell background color. Therefore, this method also starts the stocks timer to reset the change direction.
        Specified by:
        updateStockPrice in interface IWatchlistModel
        Parameters:
        stockSymbol - the symbol of the stock to set the price for
        newPrice - the new price

      • getWatchlistStockIds

        public java.lang.String[] getWatchlistStockIds()
        Gets the symbols of all the stocks contained in the watchlist. Used for the provided unit tests.
        Returns:
        a String array of the stock symbols.
